Package sda

Class Tasks

java.lang.Object
sda.Tasks
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Tasks
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This is a model class and it represents a Tasks object and it contains necessary fields and methods to operate on task object.
Since:
2021-03-05
Version:
1.0
Author:
HAilu

  • Constructor Details

    • Tasks

      public Tasks​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String project, java.time.LocalDate dueDate)
      Creating an object of Tasks class
      Parameters:
      title - A String that holds the title of a task and it cannot be empty or null.
      project - A String that holds the name of project associated with task, and it could be an empty string.
      dueDate - The due date of the task as yyyy-mm-dd format

      Returns:

      public void setTitle​(java.lang.String title) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      A method to set the title of a Task object
      Parameters:
      title - A String that holds the title of a task and it cannot be empty or null.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if title is null or empty string

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
      A method to get the completed status of task
      Returns:
      true: if the task is marked as completed, otherwise it will return false

    • setDueDate

      public void setDueDate​(java.time.LocalDate dueDate) throws java.time.DateTimeException
      A method to set the due date of a task
      Parameters:
      dueDate - The due date of the task as yyyy-mm-dd format
      Throws:
      java.time.DateTimeException - if given date is a past date

    • formattingTask

      public java.lang.String formattingTask()
      A method to get the task data as formatted string to display in multiple lines
      Returns:
      formatted string of all fields of a task
